Class PageLoader

no.ntnu.idatt1005.controller.PageLoader
public class PageLoader extends Object

PageLoader

Class responsible for loading the user-interface.

      public void addToFridge(String name, String amount, String unit) throws IllegalArgumentException

      Throws:

    • addRecipeToRecipesPane

      public void addRecipeToRecipesPane(String name, String unit, String defaultPortions, String instructions) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a recipe to the recipes pane with provided details.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the recipe.
      unit - The unit of the recipe (e.g., portions).
      defaultPortions - The default portions for the recipe.
      instructions - The instructions for preparing the recipe.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If any argument is invalid.

    • loadRecipeAddPane

      public void loadRecipeAddPane()
      Calls to loadRecipeAddPane() with empty arguments. Used to create a new recipe.

    • loadRecipeAddPane

      public void loadRecipeAddPane(String name, String instructions, float defaultPortions, List<IDAmountStruct> ingredients)
      Loads the recipe add pane. The recipe add pane edits an existing recipe or creates a new one. Adds pre-data name, instructions default portions and ingredients which belong to a given recipe. The recipe add pane contains text areas to edit the name and instructions. Buttons to increment or decrement the portions of a recipe, as well as buttons to add new ingredients to a recipe.
      Parameters:
      name - name of a recipe.
      instructions - instructions to the recipe
      defaultPortions - portions the recipe will create.
      ingredients - ingredients in the recipe

    • loadRecipeInstructionsPane

      public void loadRecipeInstructionsPane(String name, String instructions, float defaultPortions, List<IDAmountStruct> ingredients)
      Loads the recipe instructions pane with the provided name and instructions.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the recipe.
      instructions - The instructions for preparing the recipe.

    • clearRecipesPane

      public void clearRecipesPane()
      Clears all recipes from the recipes pane.

    • clearIngredientsPane

      public void clearIngredientsPane()
      Clears all ingredients from the ingredients pane.

    • removeRecipeFromRecipes

      public void removeRecipeFromRecipes(String name)
      Finds a recipe vbox with a given name, and removes it from the recipesPane.
      Parameters:
      name - name of a recipe.

    • addIngredientToIngredientsPane

      public void addIngredientToIngredientsPane(String name, float defaultAmount, String unit) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds an ingredient to the ingredients pane using the specified name, default amount, and unit. This method constructs interactive components for adjusting amounts, adding to a list, and managing the ingredient via edit and remove functionalities.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the ingredient to be added.
      defaultAmount - The default amount of the ingredient, used for initial display and adjustments.
      unit - The unit of measurement for the ingredient (e.g., grams, liters).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If any of the parameters are invalid or if the ingredient cannot be added to the pane.

    • clearIngredientPane

      public void clearIngredientPane()
      Clears all the ingredients from the ingredient pane. This method removes all child nodes from the ingredientsPane, effectively emptying the display.

    • removeIngredientFromIngredients

      public void removeIngredientFromIngredients(String name)
      Removes a specific ingredient from the ingredients pane based on its name. This method locates the ingredient container by ID and removes the specified ingredient if found.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the ingredient to remove.

    • addItemToPurchasePlan

      public void addItemToPurchasePlan(IDAmountStruct item, String unit)
      Adds an item to the purchase plan.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to add.
      unit - The unit of the item.
